turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order two small thin crust pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: one with extra pepperoni and heavy sauce, one with mushrooms, green peppers and sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, will that be all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That would be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So i have 2 small, thin crust pizzas. one with extra pepperoni, and heavy sauce. the other is mushrooms, green peppers and heavy sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's not correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say it's not correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: please confirm your request again.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The second pizza is mushrooms, green peppers, and sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you, so i have: 2 small thin crust pizzas. one with extra pepperoni, and heavy sauce. the other is mushrooms, green peppers and sausage. is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! thank you! your total is $25 plus tax.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 48 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you and enjoy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
